Dialogue.Page: A dark shadowy world. Were it not for intermittent flashes of lightning, it would be largely invisible against the background of space.
Unfortunately, this world is so nebulous and mysterious that even a Hearthian ship log cannot record data on it.
Until ship logs can be obtained, we can learn nothing new here.
A dark shadowy world. Were it not for intermittent flashes of lightning, it would be largely invisible against the background of space.
Wait how did you unlock this entry condition, that's impossible!
